survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities at professional conferences to improve future event planning.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency with industry standards.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse participation.

script.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide qualitative insights for organizers.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Quantify networking success for actionable insights.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?

questions.question_text: Did the conference networking opportunities meet your expectations?

script.question_text: Did the conference networking opportunities meet your expectations?
